member.name: T:NQualityOfLife.Attributes.RecursiveAttribute
member.summary: The method is recursive on itself directly, or trough other methods

member.name: M:NQualityOfLife.Attributes.RecursiveAttribute.#ctor
member.summary: The method calls itself / Is recursive on itself

member.name: T:NQualityOfLife.Attributes.LazyAttribute
member.summary:
The method returns a lazy and/or enumerates the inputs lazily
The opposite of
member.remarks: All methods that have an input or return an should have this attributeor the to clarify the behaviour

member.name: T:NQualityOfLife.Attributes.EagerAttribute
member.summary:
The method eagerly iterates any input or the output is not a lazy
The opposite of
member.remarks: Should only be applied to eager methods that have an input parameter or return a because methods that do not input or output a are known to be eager

member.name: T:NQualityOfLife.Attributes.ExperimentalAttribute
member.summary: Marks a method or class as experimental, Meaning it is still in development and could be unstable or un-optimized.

member.name: T:NQualityOfLife.Attributes.ThreadSafeAttribute
member.summary: The method can be safely used with async tasks and multithreading

member.name: T:NQualityOfLife.Attributes.MustUseReturnAttribute
member.summary: The return value must be used!

member.name: T:NQualityOfLife.Attributes.PureIshAttribute
member.summary: The return value must be used, and the methed doesn't have side effects - Error logging/throwing is allowed in case of internal errors, or the input is obviously invalid

member.name: T:NQualityOfLife.Attributes.ImpureAttribute
member.summary:
The method has side effects or the return is not always the same for the same inputs
For example all methods are generally impure
The opposite of

member.name: T:NQualityOfLife.Attributes.MutatesAttribute
member.summary: The specified parameters are mutated by the method

member.name: T:NQualityOfLife.Attributes.MutatedAttribute
member.summary: The specified parameter is mutated by the method

member.name: T:NQualityOfLife.Attributes.TestedAttribute
member.summary: The relevant feature was tested in game and confirmed to work as designed.

member.name: T:NQualityOfLife.Attributes.AuthorsAttribute
member.summary: Information about when the member was modifed and by whom

member.name: T:NQualityOfLife.Attributes.AliasAttribute
member.summary: The method is identical to another method with a different name

member.name: T:NQualityOfLife.Attributes.ImplicitOperatorAttribute
member.summary: Implicit operators should be marked with this attribute

member.name: T:NQualityOfLife.Attributes.InterfaceForAttribute
member.summary:
The method is used to make calling another method easier
For example it is the public member that then calls internal methods

member.name: T:NQualityOfLife.Attributes.ToDoAttribute
member.summary: Attribute for keeping track of things that need to be done

member.name: T:NQualityOfLife.Attributes.PatchIfEnabledAttribute
member.summary:
Used on harmony patch classes to conditionally apply the patches
Should only be applied to classes with a attribute

member.name: T:NQualityOfLife.Attributes.UnusedAttribute
member.summary: The member is not used for anything at the moment but might be in the future

member.name: T:NQualityOfLife.Attributes.HasQATesterAttribute
member.summary: This method has a QA tester to ensure functionality and or performance

member.name: T:NQualityOfLife.Attributes.UsedInQATesterAttribute
member.summary:
The method is used to verify the results of a QA test
for this reason all methods with the should have a QA tester of their own

member.name: T:NQualityOfLife.Attributes.RequiresModAttribute
member.summary: Indicates that the method or class requires some other mod to be running in order to work

member.name: T:NQualityOfLife.Attributes.ExcludeFromAnalyzerXMLAttribute

This should be done if the class or method doesn't do any computations during run time or the method causes the analyzer to break
